Autotransformers.name: Autotransformers
Autotransformers.title: WELCOME TO TECHSOL
Autotransformers.description: These high-voltage transformers are particularly used for connecting grids at different voltages. If voltage levels are close, autotransformers provide economical advantage. Ä°n autotransformers, measures should be taken particularly against short circuits. Three-phase and single phase autotransformers up to 550kV, 500MVA, produced in BEST plants, have also successfully completed short circuit tests and they have been in operation since their first introduction in the grids.
keyNotes: Constant Flux Voltage Variation or Variable Flux Voltage Variation designs

Generator Transformers.name: Generator Transformers
Generator Transformers.title: WELCOME TO TECHSOL
Generator Transformers.description: Generator transformers amplify generator output voltage to transmission line voltage. They should be designed in consideration of generator characteristics. They can have Neutral and Load step switches. Generator transformers have vital importance in meeting continuous and quality energy need of grids.
keyNotes: Designs made in consideration of overexcitation and loading curves of generators

Railroad Transformers.name: Railroad Transformers
Railroad Transformers.title: WELCOME TO TECHSOL
Railroad Transformers.description: These transformers reduce line voltage to the supply voltage of railroad line. Issues specific to railroad systems, notably high overcurrents, should be taken into consideration. BEST also contributes to this field with transformers that it provided to many railroad transportation systems including Marmaray.
keyNotes: Special Care made to frequently repeated overcurrents

Mobile Transformers.name: Mobile Transformers
Mobile Transformers.title: WELCOME TO TECHSOL
Mobile Transformers.description: These transformers are used at mobile switchyards and loaded on transportation vehicles such as truck or railway carriage. As they can be used at multiple points of the grid, compliance with multiple voltage levels required. BEST produces transformers for mobile switchyards in many countries in cooperation with its experienced solution partners.
keyNotes: Land and railroad transportation limitations are complied
